nodes.text: A group of gray-colored, heavily-cratered asteroids was located within the galaxy by the year 25,793 BBY. That year, the Devourer—a starship under the command of the Rakatan Predor Tul'kar of the Infinite Empire—vanished from Rakatan sensors at that location.

Two months later, during her search for Xesh—a Force Hound of the Infinite Empire who had been aboard the Devourer—his fellow Force Hound Trill stopped her scout starship at the same exact location in space from where the Devourer had disappeared, which brought her near the asteroid group. While drifting in space nearby, Trill used both her senses and memories of Xesh to pick up his trail in the Force, and then proceeded to pilot her starship away from the asteroids in further search of the Force Hound, which ultimately led Trill to the planet of Krev Coeur in the Tython system.

The unidentified group of asteroids was first depicted in the seventh issue of the Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi series of comic books. The issue was published in 2012 and was written by John Ostrander and penciled by Jan Duursema.
